name: A Gypsy's Tale: The Tower of Secrets
name_original: A Gypsy's Tale: The Tower of Secrets
description:
A Gypsy's Tale: The Tower of Secrets is an adventure game developed by Amaranth Games. It came out on 08-08-2010. It was published by Big Fish Games.
A Gypsy's Tale: The Tower of Secrets is available on PC.
